title: Create a Ticket

radioB.label: Select your desired ticket type
radioB.desc: Longer lock durations grants greater voting weight.

qty: Enter the quantity you wish to lock

text.equivalent: your ticket will be equivalent to
text.area: in terms of voting and airdrop surface area.

noDL.title: Via raw Beet deeplink
noDL.step1: Launch the BEET wallet and navigate to 'Raw Link' in the menu.
noDL.step2: From this page you can either allow all operations, or solely allow operation 57 'Ticket create' (then click save).
noDL.step3: Once 'Ready for raw links' shows in Beet submit this request.
noDL.label: Enter your account ID

DL.title: Raw deeplink generated
DL.step1: Your BEET deeplink has been generated, click the button to proceed.
DL.step2: A BEET prompt will display, verify the contents then approve the create ticket prompt.
DL.step3: Go to the 'Fetch tickets' page to download your ticket for analysis.

leaderChange.title: As a result of creating this ticket, the top 10 leaderboard stats will change as such
